channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA

item.title: Report X-2024051035
item.description:
Report X-2024051035

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-30T18:16:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-09
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PKG WAS TAKEN OUT OF A SMALLS BAG ONTO THE BELT WHEN THE BAG DUMPER NOTICE THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING. HE STOPPED THE BELT,LEFT THE AREA AND NOTIFIED HIS SUPERVISOR. THE SUPERVISOR THEN CALLED FOR A DESIGNATED RESPONDER. THE AREA WAS DECONTAMINATED FOLLOWING THE DECONTAMINATION CHECKLIST. THE PKG WAS DISC TO BE UNDECLARED.
